item.description:
BY POPULAR DEMAND

Thank you to our member Steppers that thought of this idea; to do some steppin' on a Boston Harbor Cruise. We have collaborated with Finesse Entertainment to provide a unique opportunity to step;

"Dress with FINESSE!" Harbor Cruise

All aboard the "Spirit of Boston", the luxury cruise ship.
featuring R&B recording artist:

"Rose Royce"

Memorial Day Weekend, Saturday, May 29, 2010
(11 PM - 3 AM!!) Boarding starts @ 11 PM Sharp!
Pre-Cruise Social @ the Seaport Bar & Grille (right next door) - 9:30 PM - 11 PM

We will be provided with priority board privileges, so we can "get to steppin" as soon as we board.
Get there early, we have arranged for guaranteed floor time.

ATTIRE: Tropical White - We will look soooooooooo good.

$45 Advance Only Tickets are now available.
See/Contact Gentleman Steven for tickets (cash/check).
Online Ticket Purchases are also available (service charge added).
item.how_to_find_us: We will all be dressed in White

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Steppers Set "Tropical White" Boat Cruise
